data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Meng, Hua, Bao-Zhen (2017): Discovery of Neopanorpa chillcotti Byers (Mecoptera: Panorpidae) from Tibet, China, with discussion of its generic status. Zootaxa 4232 (2): 241-250, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4232.2.7|6 occurrences
